data.text: @jeffreyjonsmith @joanwalsh That's Margo Jefferson for you - a consummate wordsmith.

@professorkim @joanwalsh Fwiw (prolly zilch but, hey, it's a beautiful Sunday afternoon), in Boucicault's The Octoroon, mentioned by Jefferson as ex of the tragic fate assigned to the "mulatto" in pop culture, it was only in the US version that Zoe kills herself. In UK one she & George got back together.
@professorkim Isn’t that the truth. She’s always compelling! Just found out Jefferson will be speaking in my town soon and am EXTREMELY excited.
